titles.title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to allow certain loans that are not fully amortizing to be used in seller carryback financing on residential mortgage loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 1/14/2013--Introduced. Amends the Truth in Lending Act to modify the exclusion from the definition of "mortgage originator" seller financing of three properties in a 12-month period to remove the requirement that a residential mortgage loan be fully amortizing.
